name: Goblins
startIntroPart1: Hiē, je gobla kin. Yu polk ay gobli
declaringWar: Yu veri glut. Wiē declur wīr
uniques: [+20]% Production when constructing [Goblin] units [in all cities]

name: Bone Lands
startIntroPart1: We are warriors of death, and you are one of us
declaringWar: Death does not pass anyone by
attacked: Only the brave or the fool can attack the dead!
defeated: You were able to kill the dead.....
introduction: We are an army of bones, we welcome you
uniques: [+20]% Production when constructing [Skeleton] units [in all cities]

name: Blue Kingdom
attacked: I will give everything not to lose!
defeated: I tried, but you are stronger...
introduction: Nice to meet you, I'm the king of the Red Kingdom
uniques: [+20]% Production when constructing [Knight] units [in all cities]

name: Red Kingdom
attacked: I will give everything not to lose!
defeated: I tried, but you are stronger...
introduction: Nice to meet you, I'm the king of the Blue Kingdom
uniques: [+20]% Production when constructing [Giant] units [in all cities]

name: Temple of Riders
attacked: Looks like we couldn't come to an agreement.
introduction: We will hope for a peaceful existence
uniques: [+20]% Production when constructing [Mounted] units [in all cities]

name: Shooters
startIntroPart1: We are the royal archers. And you are our ruler
declaringWar: You didn't fit the most ideals
attacked: The whole kingdom will be against you
defeated: We couldn't. But your hideous empire will be erased one day
introduction: We are peaceful shooters. We wish everyone peace
uniques: [+20]% Production when constructing [Archer] units [in all cities]
[+20]% Production when constructing [Gunpowder] units [in all cities]

name: Miners
startIntroPart1: We love drilling, come with us!
declaringWar: Let our drills drill your heads
attacked: All we wanted was a peaceful existence...
defeated: We worked for others... and you destroyed this work...
introduction: We are old miners. Let's live together
uniques: [+20]% Production when constructing [Buffer] units [in all cities]

name: Mages
declaringWar: Everyone who stands in the way of magicians will be destroyed!
defeated: It seems we lost, but not for long.
introduction: Magical blood flows in our veins!
uniques: [+20]% Production when constructing [Magic] units [in all cities]
[+20]% Production when constructing [Spell] units [in all cities]

name: Village of Builder
startIntroPart1: We have been building structures for centuries, and we will build our civilization!
declaringWar: 'We will build new settlements on the corpse of your civilization
defeated: An error was made in our drawings...

name: Barbarians
uniques: [Water] units gain the [Unable to pillage tiles] promotion
